com.langtonsant.application.element.grid

Interface IGrid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grid

    public interface IGrid
    Contract defining a standard grid

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns:
        the current width of the grid

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns:
        the current height of the grid

      • getCellAt

        ICell getCellAt(Vector2 position)
        Return the cell from the grid at the given vector2 coordinates
        Parameters:
        position - the coordinates ot the desired cell
        Returns:
        the cell at the given position

      • getCellAt

        ICell getCellAt(int x,
                int y)
        Return the cell from the grid at the given x and y coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate in the grid
        y - the y coordinate in the grid
        Returns:
        the cell at the given position

      • setCellAt

        void setCellAt(Vector2 position,
               ICell cell)
        Set the cell at the coordinates in the grid
        Parameters:
        position - the target coordinates
        cell - the cell to set

      • setInitialisationStrategy

        void setInitialisationStrategy(ICellInitialisationStrategy strategy)
        Defines the strategy to initialize the grid with
        Parameters:
        strategy - the chosen strategy to set the grid

      • computeNewHeadingFrom

        Vector2 computeNewHeadingFrom(Vector2 positionInGrid,
                              Vector2 headingVector)
        Compute a new direction based on a given position in the grid and a given direction
        Parameters:
        positionInGrid - the given position from which to compute the new heading
        headingVector - the base heading vector from which to compute the new heading
        Returns:
        the computed new direction

      • cycleCellAt

        void cycleCellAt(Vector2 positionInGrid)
        Transform the cell at a given position with the next cell
        Parameters:
        positionInGrid - the coordinates in the grid

      • isValidPosition

        boolean isValidPosition(Vector2 positionInGrid)
        Check if the given coordinates is inside the grid
        Parameters:
        positionInGrid - the given coordinates
        Returns:
        true if the coordinates are inside the grid, false otherwise

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the grid by reinitialising each cell

      • sizeGridUp

        Vector2 sizeGridUp()
        Size the grid up. Should be called if an invalid coordinates is found. The process place the old grid in the center of the new grid. So the old grid coordinates are "shifted"
        Returns:
        the shifting amount of the old coordinates.
